precision mediump float; in vec2 vTextureCoord; in vec3 vVertexPosition;uniform sampler2D uBgTexture; uniform sampler2D uTexture; uniform vec2 uMousePos; uniform int uSampleBg;out vec4 fragColor;void main() { vec2 uv = vTextureCoord; vec2 pos = mix(vec2(0), (uMousePos - 0.5), 0.00);uv = uv - pos;vec4 color = texture(uTexture, uv); vec4 background = vec4(0);if(uSampleBg == 1) { background = texture(uBgTexture, vTextureCoord); }color = mix(background, color / max(color.a, 0.0001), color.a * 1.00);fragColor = color; }
